content: अष्टन् {%<ab>num. a.</ab>%} [अश्-व्याप्तौ कनिन् तुट् च <ls>Uṇ. 1. 154.</ls>] (<ab>nom.</ab> <ab>acc.</ab> अष्ट-ष्टौ) Eight. It often occurs in <ab>comp.</ab> as अष्टा with numerals and some other nouns; as अष्टादशन्, अष्टाविंशतिः, अष्टापद &c. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%octo%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%okto%}; Zend. {%astan%}; Pers. {%hasht%}.].
